data.title: S.S. Lazio 2024 Wages
data.meta_description: How much do S.S. Lazio pay their players? Find S.S. Lazio 2024 total wage bill and player breakdown. The most comprehensive sports salary database.
data.text:
Who is S.S. Lazio's highest earner?

Ciro Immobile has the highest salary at S.S. Lazio, earning $167,140 per week

What is S.S. Lazio's yearly wage bill in 2024?

S.S. Lazio total salary bill is $84,737,843 per year

What is S.S. Lazio's weekly wage bill in 2024?

S.S. Lazio total salary bill is $1,629,574 per week
